title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Automobile sales in units, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Automobile sales in units has increased over the Year.
Automobile sales in units is roughly constant from 2006 to 2008, roughly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2015, and lastly roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Max Automobile sales in units about 2490664.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Automobile sales in units about 1286310.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Automobile sales in units, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2018.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2009.
